section.heading: Purchaser liability—Penalty—Streamlined sales and use tax agreement

content.p: Purchasers are relieved from liability for tax, interest, and penalty for having failed to pay the correct amount of sales or use tax in any of the following circumstances:
A purchaser relied on erroneous data provided by the department in the taxability matrix completed by the department pursuant to RCW 82.32.740 ; or
A purchaser relied on erroneous data provided by the department on tax rates, boundaries, or taxing jurisdiction assignments.

For purposes of this section, "penalty" means an amount imposed for noncompliance that is not fraudulent, willful, or intentional that is in addition to the correct amount of sales or use tax and interest. [ 2007 c 6 s 703 .] NOTES: Part headings not law — Savings — Effective date — Severability — 2007 c 6: See notes following RCW 82.32.020 . Findings — Intent — 2007 c 6: See note following RCW 82.14.390 .
